name: BUNKER: ESCAPE
description:
Description

Make your way through levels full of zombies and other monsters! Can you find your way out and escape? 

Collect Coins and other collectibles to unlock playable extras! From a music player, to a fully playable demo, this game is full of things to do!

More About the game

This is a prequel to my next project: BUNKER. This title will not be very story heavy, as I thought it would be better to focus more on gameplay this time. 

Version

1.0

Release Date

August 13th 2021
